refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all the regions that use one of the shaders specified.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists all the regions that use one of the shaders specified.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the which_shader command to list all the regions that use the specified shaders.

example.title: List the regions that use the specified shaders.
example.para: Lists all regions in the current database that use the plastic or light shaders.
